description.text: Static Analysis Security Test results using @ShiftLeft/sast-scan
Static Analysis Security Test results using @ShiftLeft/sast-scan

help.text:
The application stores sensitive information in cleartext within a resource that might be accessible to another control sphere.
Because the information is stored in cleartext, attackers could potentially read it. Even if the information is encoded in a way that is not human-readable, certain techniques could determine which encoding is being used, then decode the information.
help.markdown:
The application stores sensitive information in cleartext within a resource that might be accessible to another control sphere.
Because the information is stored in cleartext, attackers could potentially read it. Even if the information is encoded in a way that is not human-readable, certain techniques could determine which encoding is being used, then decode the information.

fullDescription.text: The application stores sensitive information in cleartext within a resource that might be accessible to another control sphere.

message.text:
